main event: A UFO-like object shaped like a guided missile was observed near Auburn, California on July 21, 1956.
interesting points: The object was 7-8 feet long and emitted chunks of fire,The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes,The UFO appeared 200 feet above the river and followed its course,The object had a green and orange color, There was no sound reported from the object.
sighted object: UFO-like object shaped like a guided missile
witness description: An individual observing from the riverbank
